reviewText: I don't know WHO wrote the synopsis for the movie TIM but next time WATCH the movie before hand!!!!!!  You have no clue what the movie is about!  Excellent movie!

This order was delivered on time and in an Amazon box with protective air pockets inside. It was in great condition. No scratches or anything like that. They are also both excellent movies, in my opinion (but that may just be because I think Mel Gibson was a real cutie XD). Very good purchase. I recommend it.
Mel Gibson is a great actor.
Meet the earliest and handsomest Mel Gibson. You won't regret it. Tim is the best of the package and Piper Laurie is always a pleasure to watch.
